active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group debate, argue whether accountability for data protection should ever be fully delegable from the data owner to a custodian or processor. Use real-world examples like a GDPR breach to support your position and evaluate counterarguments.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Generate 3 distractors: 1 common misconception (e.g., confuse owner with custodian), 1 edge case/role mix-up (e.g., system owner duties), 1 exaggerated/absent responsibility.
Ensure plausibility: Base on research/web context or real-world errors (e.g., 'CEO is always data owner' as distractor).
